thread.title: Coronation Street spoiler: Tracy Barlow to be ARRESTED for helping Rob Donovan escape from prison?
thread.title_full: Coronation Street spoiler: Tracy Barlow to be ARRESTED for helping Rob Donovan escape from prison?

author: Hayley Minn
title: Coronation Street spoiler: Tracy Barlow to be ARRESTED for helping Rob Donovan escape from prison?
text:
Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Marc Baylis was recently spotted filming on the Coronation Street set, meaning Rob Donovan was returning to the cobbles. 
And now, it seems the man who murdered Michelle Keegan's character Tina McIntyre, is going to land his ex Tracy Barlow and her daughter Amy in trouble too. 
New pictures from the ITV soap set have emerged of a dramatic Corrie siege - which sees Tracy getting arrested. 
In the snaps, Kate Ford's character is seen emerging from a building she and Rob have been holed up. Tracy Barlow is going to be arrested by police (Photo: Eamonn and James Clarke) It will be part of Rob Donovan's return to the soap (Photo: Eamonn and James Clarke) Are Amy and Tracey in danger? (Photo: Eamonn and James Clarke) 
Wearing a green parka and jeans, she's handcuffed by police as she's dragged out of the remote farmhouse. 
And Rob isn't far away - as he's seen trying to flee the scene, surrounded by armed police. 
In 2016, Tracy called the police on her boyfriend after she discovered he had killed Tina. 
Rob was sentenced to 25 years in prison but it seems he's escaped. Are the armed police shooting at Rob? (Photo: Eamonn and James Clarke) It looks very dramatic! (Photo: Eamonn and James Clarke) 
Has he come to get his revenge on Tracy and her daughter? 
Or is Tracy in fact being arrested for HELPING her ex escape? 
It wouldn't be the first time Tracy has been in trouble with the police... 
*Coronation Street continues on ITV1 tonight at 7.30pm Like us on Facebook
